title: Gluten Free Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon gluten-free baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '160g rice flour', '100g potato starch', '110g vegetable margarine', '150g caster sugar', '250g pumpkin puree', '40g walnuts, pulsed in a food processor until ground']
